Sassy Baby

About Us

Sassy is the original developmental toy company. For over 25 years, Sassy has worked with developmental experts, as well as industry-leading designers to create developmentally inspired toys that captivate infants, while providing foundational structure for lifelong learning. Our toys feature a few key elements, including high-contrast patterns, bold colors, and unique materials, which are all designed to stimulate babyâ€™s senses, as well as teach them about their world. Sassy focuses on development for your baby, so they can focus on fun!


Our Story

Since their 2009 acquisition by parent company, Crown Crafts, Inc., Neat Solutions has become a leader and innovator in infant and toddler products including bibs and disposable feeding solutions. Today, Neat Solutions continues to lead in these categories through proprietary design expertise, as well as with an extensive list of world-class licensed collections for infants and toddlers.
